meanings.meaning: your good deed for the day

vlive.korean: [재현이 선행 쪽지] 10명 단체로 커피 돌리기! [Jaehyun's message] 10 glasses of coffee for everyone! 듣기 View video Golden Child : 비디오 판독 요청할 기세인 우하고 학생들 feat.체육시간ㅣ우하동 EP.3
vlive.english: [Jaehyun's message] 10 glasses of coffee for everyone!

vlive.korean: [성적 우수 선행 쪽지 수여식 끝!] 얘들아 박수! [All done with picking the awards!] A round of applause! 듣기 View video Golden Child : 비디오 판독 요청할 기세인 우하고 학생들 feat.체육시간ㅣ우하동 EP.3
vlive.english: [All done with picking the awards!] A round of applause!

vlive.korean: 조이야 원래 선행학습이 중요해 앉아! Joy, it's important to learn. Sit down! 듣기 View video Golden Child : 골든차일드(Golden Child) ‘골차의 휴일 2’ #3
vlive.english: Joy, it's important to learn. Sit down!

vlive.korean: 그렇죠. - 선행이죠. Right. - A good deed. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] GOLDEN CHILD X LieV - 골든차일드의 눕방라이브!
이건 동현이의 선행이죠. That was Dong Hyun's good deed. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] GOLDEN CHILD X LieV - 골든차일드의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: That was Dong Hyun's good deed.

examples.korean: a reward for good behaviour 발음듣기 선행에 대한 보상 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a reward for good behaviour 발음

examples.korean: Whose right of way is it? 발음듣기 선행권이 누구에게 있죠? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Whose right of way is it? 발음

examples.korean: Prayers should be accompanied by good works. 발음듣기 기도에는 선행이 따라야 한다. (서양속담, 공부속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: Prayers should be accompanied by good works. 발음

examples.korean: Doing a good deed every day is hard. 발음듣기 매일 선행을 하는 것은 어렵다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: Doing a good deed every day is hard. 발음

examples.korean: The good you do today, people will often forget tomorrow; Do good anyway. (Mother Teresa) 발음듣기 당신이 오늘 베푼 선행은 내일이면 사람들에게 잊혀질 것이다. 그래도 선행을 베풀어라. (마더 테레사, 겸손명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: The good you do today, people will often forget tomorrow; Do good anyway. (Mother Teresa) 발음
